title: Quick Tips
content:
Luck Stat & Race Rerolls: The Luck stat does NOT affect your race reroll chances. It only impacts mining drops and loot.
Save Your Runes: Don't apply runes until you get the Arcane Pickaxe. Lower-tier pickaxes will be replaced quickly.

title: Pickaxe Progression
content:
Recommended Upgrade Path: Iron Pickaxe (World 1 Shop) -> Stonewake's Pickaxe (World 1 Cave) -> Cobalt Pickaxe (World 2 Shop) -> Titanium Pickaxe (World 2 Shop) -> Mythril Pickaxe (World 2 Shop) -> Arcane Pickaxe (Bard Quest World 1).

Money-Saving Tip: Before upgrading to your next pickaxe, buy a Bronze Pickaxe first. Then sell your current pickaxe to recover gold. This lets you keep mining while freeing up funds to afford the next tier faster.

Rune Tip: Only apply runes to the Arcane Pickaxe. Equip all 3 Luck Runes for maximum luck (up to 16% bonus each).

Earning Money for Arcane Pickaxe: Complete Monkey Quest, Line's Quest, and work on Rowan's and Moro's quests. Farm high-tier mobs for Essence or forge/sell Heavy Armor/Colossal Swords.

title: Money Making Methods
content:
1. Farm High-Tier Mobs for Essence: Kill high-tier enemies to collect Essence, then sell it for significant profit.
2. Forge & Sell Heavy Armor or Colossal Swords: These high-tier items fetch the best prices and are ideal for converting ores into gold.

title: Best Races
content:
Mining: 1st: Angel (+30% Luck), 2nd: Dwarf (+15% Mining Damage).
Combat: Demon (Best for fighting enemies).
Utility: Dwarf (+5% Forge Quality), Goblin (-12% Shop Prices).

title: Best Gamepasses
content:
Recommended Purchase Order:
1. Double Storage: Doubles inventory capacity.
2. Fast Forge: Significantly speeds up forging time.
3. Sell Anywhere: Sell items from anywhere.
4. Better Forge: Essential for improving forge quality.
5. Supporter: Increases luck and xp gain by 10%.
6. Forge Anywhere: Access forge from any location.

title: Runes Guide
content:
Farming Miner Runes: Kill Bombers in World 2.

Weapon Rune Optimization:
- Fast Attack Speed: Use Lethality substats.
- Slow Attack Speed: Use Attack Speed substats.
- Universal: One Drain Rune and one Blast Rune.

Armor Rune Optimization:
- Substats: Vitality or Movement Speed.
- Recommended: Briar Runes.

Rune Recommendations by Gear:
- Dagger: Drain Edge + Blast Chip (AS/Lethality or Crit)
- Straight Sword: Blast Chip + Drain Edge/Blast Chip (AS/Lethality or Crit)
- Gauntlet: Drain Edge + Blast Chip (AS/Lethality or Crit)
- Katana: Blast Chip + Drain Edge/Blast Chip (AS/Lethality or Crit)
- Colossal Sword: Blast Chip + Blast Chip (Lethality)
- Armor: Any (Mainly Vitality and Surge)
- Pickaxe: Luck > Mine Power/Speed > Yield

title: Quest Priority Guide
content:
World 1 Priorities:
1. Sensei Moro Quest (Top priority)
2. Bard Quest (Required for Arcane Pickaxe)
! Cat Quest (Very low priority)

World 2 Priorities:
1. Sensei Moro Quest (Top priority)
2. Masked Stranger Daily Quests (High priority)
3. Captain Rowan Quest (Prioritize in World 2)
4. Line's Quest (High priority)
5. Monkey Quest (Good for quick money)
! Goblin King Quest (Very low priority)
